thread.title: David Gifford
thread.title_full: Trade Tested reviewed by David Gifford

author: David Gifford
title: David Gifford
text: Some year ago I purchased a 3.5 KVA generator from Trade Tested and whilst it did the job adequately, after 6 years of jiggling around in my motorhome it was due for replacement. The new revised version, a 3200W was purchased a couple of months ago and I would have to say it is a far better, more reliable machine than its predecessor. Quick to start with quiet consistent operation. We use it in our motorhome for powering the coffee machine and the dishwasher and it I can recommend this to anyone looking for a reliable, cost effective generator. The remote is great too, no more getting out of bed and pulling cords for me. Thanks Trade Tested, your service and products blow away the competition. Thanks..David
